name: VaricellaTestsForVaricellaZosterVirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Varicella (Tests for Varicella zoster virus by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test associated with detecting the presence of Varicella zoster virus in culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Varicella zoster culture/isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
